title: Cyberpunk 2077 celebrity showdown: who's got the cooler character, Idris Elba or Keanu Reeves?

title: There's finally a Baldur's Gate 3 mod that will let you play as a stinky little Goblin

title: Rocket League trading site founder will never 'build a product based on the decisions of another company' again after one decision from Epic puts him out of a job
description: Epic's decision to switch off Rocket League trading will render 90% of Rocket League Garage obsolete.
